name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: Surely this one wasn't the only unlucky fellow. There ought to be more of our kind deeper in this cave.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: The cave seems to open up quite a bit further downwards. I suggest we split up to cover more ground.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: Never heard that one before, have you?

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: By the way, those berries, the uglies drop from time to time.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: When you're having just the worst day, eat some. You'll be right back to your old, healthy self.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: Anywho. See you in time, Mr. Slime.
